ValidationRule.description: C45 - if Binder Cover Option value = Logo, then the Client Name to be Printed on Binder Field must be Null
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type"), ( ISPICKVAL(Art__c, 'Logo') ), ( (NOT(ISBLANK(Client_Name_to_be_Printed_on_Binder__c))) ), (Historical_Order_Indicator__c = 0), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HR Essentials"))), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must not enter a Client Name to be Printed on Binder value when selecting the Binder Cover Option value of 'Logo'.
